text: Suzanna Leigh (born Sandra Eileen Anne Smith; 26 July 1945 â€“ 11 December 2017) was a British actress. She was known for her movie and television roles in the 1960s and 1970s. She was born in Berkshire, England. She was known for her role as the love interest of Elvis Presley in Paradise, Hawaiian Style (1966). Leigh starred in the cult British horror movies The Deadly Bees (1966) and The Fiend (1972). In 1974 she starred as Amber in Son of Dracula. Leigh died of liver cancer on 11 December 2017 at her home in Winter Beach, Florida at the age of 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * Interview with Joe Krein , Elvis2001.net * InStyle UK: 60s Fashion: Women Who Made The Decade Achingly Cool (pictured at numbers 32 & 42) , instyle.co.uk Category:1945 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Florida Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:Actors from Berkshire
title: Suzanna Leigh
